resources.string:
Sorry, your device is not currently supported by the CyanogenMod Installer.

For more information please check the supported device list.

You may continue to prepare your device for installation at your own risk.

This app will assist you as you install the CyanogenMod experience. You will need a Windows PC running Vista or newer, or a modern (x86) Mac, and a USB cable.\n\nYour device will be factory reset during this process, so please ensure important data is backed up before continuing.
Continue installation on Your Windows PC
To proceed, enable USB Debugging on the next screen as shown below.
To proceed, enable Camera (PTP) on the next screen as shown below.
To proceed, please disable Fast Boot on the next screen as shown below.
Your device is now prepared for CyanogenMod installation. Visit the website below on your computer to continue:
Your device has been successfully detected by the CyanogenMod installer. Congratulations! To continue, return to the CyanogenMod Installer on your Windows PC and follow the instructions.
Your device has been successfully detected by the CyanogenMod installer. Congratulations! To continue, return to the CyanogenMod Installer on your Mac and follow the instructions.
Unplug your device from your computer to continue the installation process.\n\nDo not plug in your device again until prompted to by the installer.

Installing CyanogenMod will completely replace your phone's operating system, and in rare cases, this may cause your device to become nonfunctional.

But we've worked very hard to make sure that the installation is as reliable and safe as possible.

By continuing, you understand the potential risks.
